The claim is supported by data from Heal: gov, the official exchange provider, which indicates that 97 Missouri counties will only have one insurance provider offering coverage on the health care exchange this year.
The reduction in coverage is primarily d: UnitedHealth Group and Aetna (known in Missouri as Coventry Health Care), opting out of participating in the exchange.
The lack of insurance options impacts in: ability to choose their preferred healthcare provider and limits competition among insurance companies, leading to higher premiums.
